text: Shrek SuperSlam is a 2005 fighting video game based on the Shrek franchise. It was released by Activision for the Nintendo DS, Nintendo GameCube, PlayStation 2 and Xbox. ==Gameplay== Up to four players can fight against each other or with a team. ==Playable Characters== *Shrek *Donkey *Princess Fiona *Puss in Boots *Gingy *Pinocchio *Captain Hook *Humpty Dumpty *G-Nome *Luna *Big Bad Wolf *Red Riding Hood Category:2005 video games Category:Shrek video games Category:Activision video games Category:3D fighting games Category:Cooperative video games Category:Fighting games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:Nintendo DS games Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:Platform fighters Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation Portable games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox games
title: Shrek SuperSlam
